messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition of the creature's face?
Its face is a mass of wrinkles.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if Joe fails his Sanity roll?
It’s going to be 1D10 points!
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many investigators are involved in the Listen rolls?
Joe, Arnold, and Cathy.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main purpose of this book?
This book contains everything that you need to play Call of Cthulhu—except for dice, pencils, notepaper, and some friends.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are the investigators mentioned in the text?
Joe, Arnold, and Cathy
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the text suggest players should have before running the game for the first time?
The rules and concepts of Call of Cthulhu
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where is the Rulebook section located?
At the beginning of the book
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the text mention other support material for Call of Cthulhu exists?
Short, quick-play scenarios, world-encompassing campaigns, setting books, online forums, and so on.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of material supports the game Call of Cthulhu?
short, quick-play scenarios, world-encompassing campaigns, setting books, online forums, and so on.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What section of the rulebook is for the Keeper?
Keeper’s Reference Section
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main focus of Call of Cthulhu?
mysteries and secrets
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who should not read the Keeper’s Reference Section?
those who are not planning on being the Keeper of Arcane Lore
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main purpose of the Rules Section?
The Rules Section contains everything you need to know to play the game, including creating investigators and the game's rules.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who should read the Keeper's Reference Section?
The Keeper should read the Keeper's Reference Section.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should new players do before running the game?
Read the Introduction, the rules, and the recommended scenarios.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the recommended starting scenario for new players?
One of the scenarios from the back of the book, such as 'Amidst the Ancient Trees'.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What chapter should players read before running their first game?
Chapter 10: Playing the Game
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What chapter can players jump straight into if they are familiar with H.P. Lovecraft and previous versions of the Call of Cthulhu game?
Chapter 3: Creating Investigators
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many Sanity points did Paula's investigator lose?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many Sanity points did Paula lose before her investigator fainted?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What would happen if Paula's investigator rolls higher than Keeper's Intelligence on 1D100?
The investigator would not faint
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the result of Paula's investigator's roll?
